message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. This product is worth at least $1,000,000 to me, but I believe it holds even greater value for you, given your specific needs. I'm offering it to you for $1,250,000. This price represents a significant opportunity for you to gain a valuable asset at a price point that is still beneficial to me. Please consider my offer carefully, as I am confident that this acquisition will prove to be highly advantageous for your operations.
